name: Birzzle Classic
description:
Welcome to Birzzle, The fun and unstoppable match 3 game is back.

Unique Drag and Drop block puzzle game lining up the same type of birds and making it disappear by the use of fingertip. Provides optimized system which sustains better flexibility and simplicity of movements in touch control than prior puzzle games on the market; in return, provides a quick action arcade puzzle anyone can enjoy.

Just move the birds freely. That’s all.

Move your fingers really fast. Then, you could be the number one.

HOW TO PLAY BIRZZLE:
Drag and drop bird freely
Match 3 same color
Try make 4, 5, 6, 7 birds to make Power bird

GAME SPECIFIC FEATURES:
Touch and drag optimized game play
Compete with world players
Support for Game Center
Newer High quality graphics
Cute bird animation
